alert.note: Alert for McHenry (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 28 at 9:32AM CDT until further notice by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota... Souris River near Westhope affecting Bottineau County. Souris River near Bantry affecting McHenry County. Souris River near Towner affecting McHenry County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and is forecast to continue. * WHERE...Souris River near Bantry. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 1440.2 feet, Water begins crossing the road several hundred feet to the left of the bridge. No towns or major roads are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 1440.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain nearly steady into the middle of the workweek. - Flood stage is 1440.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
